name: coolifymcp
description: A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides complete access to all Coolify API endpoints. CoolifyMCP enables AI assistants to interact with Coolify for managing applications, databases, servers, deployments, and more.
author: HowieDuhzit

tools.name: coolify_system
tools.description: System management operations - health check, version, and system information

tools.name: coolify_teams
tools.description: Complete team management - list teams, get current team, get team details, and list team members

tools.name: coolify_projects
tools.description: Project CRUD operations - list, create, get, update, and delete projects

tools.name: coolify_project_environments
tools.description: Project environment management - list, create, get, and delete project environments

tools.name: coolify_applications
tools.description: Application CRUD operations - list, create, update, get, and delete applications of all types

tools.name: coolify_application_lifecycle
tools.description: Application lifecycle management - start, stop, and restart applications

tools.name: coolify_application_envs
tools.description: Application environment variables management - list, create, bulk update, and delete environment variables

tools.name: coolify_logs
tools.description: Application logs and monitoring - get application logs

tools.name: coolify_application_deployments
tools.description: Application deployment management - list, get, and trigger deployments

tools.name: coolify_databases
tools.description: Database CRUD operations - list, create, get, update, and delete databases

tools.name: coolify_database_lifecycle
tools.description: Database lifecycle management - start, stop, and restart databases

tools.name: coolify_database_types
tools.description: Specific database type creation - create PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and Redis databases with type-specific parameters

tools.name: coolify_servers
tools.description: Server CRUD operations - list, create, get, update, and delete servers

tools.name: coolify_server_management
tools.description: Server operations and resources - validate server connection, list domains, and list resources

tools.name: coolify_services
tools.description: Service CRUD operations - list, create, get, update, and delete services

tools.name: coolify_service_lifecycle
tools.description: Service lifecycle management - start, stop, and restart services

tools.name: coolify_service_envs
tools.description: Service environment variables management - list, create, update, bulk update, and delete environment variables

tools.name: coolify_security_keys
tools.description: Security keys management - list, create, get, update, and delete security keys

examples.name: Check Coolify Health
examples.description: Check if your Coolify instance is healthy

examples.name: List Projects
examples.description: Get a list of all your Coolify projects

examples.name: List Applications
examples.description: Get a list of all your Coolify applications
